title: AI Firm MiniMax to Debut in Hong Kong After $619 Million IPO
description: MiniMax Group Inc., one of China’s largest generative AI startups, is set to begin trading in Hong Kong after an initial public offering that raised $619 million.
content: MiniMax Group Inc., one of China’s largest generative AI startups, is set to begin trading in Hong Kong after an initial public offering that raised $619 million.
